## getCurrentUserSubscription() function

Retrieves an existing Stripe subscription for the currently signed in user from the database.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getCurrentUserSubscription(payments: StripePayments, subscriptionId: string): Promise<Subscription>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  payments | [StripePayments](./firestore-stripe-payments.stripepayments.md) | A valid [StripePayments](./firestore-stripe-payments.stripepayments.md) object. |
|  subscriptionId | string | ID of the subscription to retrieve. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Subscription](./firestore-stripe-payments.subscription.md)<!-- -->&gt;

Resolves with a Subscription object if found. Rejects if the specified subscription ID does not exist, or if the user is not signed in.
